name: Favored Enemy
effects: Hunter's Mark is always prepared for you
you can cast Hunter's Mark without expending a spell slot a number of times equal to the Favored Enemy column in the Ranger Features table
limits: you regain all expended free casts when you finish a long rest
notes: Free-cast uses scale by Ranger level per the Favored Enemy column.
